igpp.xml

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • igpp.xml.Transform

  • public class Transform
extends Object
    Transform an XML file using a stylesheet (XSL)
    Version:
    1.00 2006
    Author:
    Todd King

      • getTransformer

        public static Transformer getTransformer(String xslFile)
                                  throws TransformerException
        Get a new transformer based on a stylesheet
        Parameters:
        xslFile - the pathname to the XML stylesheet file.
        Returns:
        the Transformer prepared to use the passed stylesheet.
        Throws:
        TransformerException

      • getTransformer

        public static Transformer getTransformer(String xslFile,
                                         HashMap<String,Templates> cache)
                                  throws TransformerException
        Load a stylesheet and maintain it in memory for reuse.
        Parameters:
        xslFile - the pathname to the XML stylesheet file.
        cache - the HashMap to maintain the prepared stylesheets.
        Returns:
        the Transformer prepared to use the passed stylesheet.
        Throws:
        TransformerException

                                 throws Exception

        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the resource to transform.
        Returns:
        a StreamSource for the URL.
        Throws:
        Exception

                           PrintStream outStream)

        Use an XML style sheet to transform an XML document and write the results to an PrintWriter.
        Parameters:
        xmlStream - the StreamSource to the XML text.
        xslFile - the pathname to the XML stylesheet file.
        outStream - the PrintStream to write the results.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • perform

        public static void perform(String xmlFile,
                           String xslFile,
                           JspWriter outStream)
                    throws Exception
        Use an XML style sheet to transform an XML document and write the results to an JspWriter. A JspWriter is the default output stream for JSP pages.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - the pathname to the XML file.
        xslFile - the pathname to the XML stylesheet file.
        outStream - the JspWriter to write the results.
        Throws:
        Exception
        Since:
        1.0

      • perform

        public static void perform(StringReader xmlFile,
                           String xslFile,
                           JspWriter outStream)
                    throws Exception
        Use an XML style sheet to transform an XML document and write the results to an JspWriter. A JspWriter is the default output stream for JSP pages.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - the StringReader for the XML text.
        xslFile - the pathname to the XML stylesheet file.
        outStream - the JspWriter to write the results.
        Throws:
        Exception
        Since:
        1.0

      • perform

        public static void perform(InputStream xmlStream,
                           String xslFile,
                           JspWriter outStream)
                    throws Exception
        Use an XML style sheet to transform an XML document and write the results to an JspWriter. A JspWriter is the default output stream for JSP pages.

      • performOnURL

        public static void performOnURL(String url,
                                String xslFile,
                                JspWriter outStream)
                         throws Exception
        Use an XML style sheet to transform an XML document returned by a URL and write the results to an JspWriter. A JspWriter is the default output stream for JSP pages.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the resource to transform.
        xslFile - the pathname to the XML stylesheet file.
        outStream - the JspWriter to write the results.
        Throws:
        Exception
        Since:
        1.0
